title: Audit for Management Override of Controls
description: An auditor specifically designs tests to detect potential management override of internal controls.

tasks.description: Analyze the journal entry log for entries posted directly by senior finance executives.
tasks.expected_outcome: The analysis identifies several large, non-standard entries made by a VP of Finance.

tasks.description: Interview the controller to ask about any instances where they were pressured to deviate from standard accounting policies.
tasks.expected_outcome: The controller describes a situation where they were asked to delay the recognition of certain expenses.

tasks.description: Review management's estimates for significant accounting areas (e.g., bad debt reserve) for any signs of bias.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor notes that management's estimates are consistently aggressive and favorable to the company.
